node.title: VoiceFlow Project Plan
node.comment: This master plan outlines the comprehensive strategy for developing, launching, and scaling the VoiceFlow Project. It covers technical development, business setup, marketing, user testing, and rollout guidelines, based on the analysis of the current project state.

node.title: Phase 1: Technical Development
node.comment: This phase focuses on building out the core application features, ensuring a robust and scalable technical foundation.

node.title: Core Transcription Engine
node.comment: The initial MVP for browser-side transcription is complete, using @xenova/transformers.js. This is a major milestone.

node.title: Feature Parity with Competitors
node.comment: To be competitive, we need to implement features offered by MacWhisper and Audio Note. This is critical for market acceptance.

node.title: Advanced Export Functionality
node.comment: Allow users to export transcripts in various formats.

node.title: Implement Subtitle Export
node.comment: Support for .srt and .vtt formats is standard and required by content creators.

node.title: Implement Document Export
node.comment: Support for .txt, .pdf, and .docx formats for wider usability.

node.title: Transcript Interaction
node.comment: Enhance the user's ability to work with the generated transcript.

node.title: Implement Transcript Search
node.comment: Allow users to search for specific words within the transcript.

node.title: Implement In-Place Editing
node.comment: Allow users to correct transcription errors directly in the UI.

node.title: Link Audio Playback to Transcript
node.comment: Clicking on a word in the transcript should jump to that point in the audio playback.

node.title: Advanced Features & Differentiators
node.comment: Features that will set VoiceFlow Pro apart from the competition.

node.title: Real-time Transcription
node.comment: Transcribe audio from the microphone in real-time.

node.title: System Audio Transcription
node.comment: Capture and transcribe audio from other applications (e.g., Zoom, Teams), a key pro feature.

node.title: Speaker Diarization
node.comment: Identify and label different speakers in the transcript. This is a high-value feature for interviews and meetings.

node.title: Infrastructure & Backend
node.comment: Ensure the backend services are ready for production.

node.title: Setup User Authentication
node.comment: Integrate Supabase or a similar service for user login and management.

node.title: Develop File Storage Solution
node.comment: Implement secure storage for user audio files and transcripts.

node.title: Production Deployment
node.comment: Set up a scalable production environment on a cloud provider like Vercel or AWS.

node.title: Phase 2: Business Foundation
node.comment: Establish the legal and financial structure of the business. This is based on the 'Business Foundation Setup' document.

node.title: Legal Foundation
node.comment: Draft and finalize all necessary legal documents.

node.title: Draft Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
node.comment: Create comprehensive ToS and Privacy Policy documents, including GDPR/CCPA compliance clauses.

node.title: Draft License Agreement
node.comment: Define licensing tiers (e.g., Individual, Team, Lifetime).

node.title: Attorney Review
node.comment: Have all legal documents reviewed by a qualified attorney.

node.title: Business Registration
node.comment: Officially register the business entity.

node.title: Form LLC
node.comment: Register 'VoiceFlow Pro LLC' and obtain an EIN from the IRS.

node.title: File for Trademark
node.comment: Perform a trademark search and file an application for the 'VoiceFlow Pro' name and logo.

node.title: Payment Integration
node.comment: Set up the system to process payments from customers.

node.title: Configure Stripe Account
node.comment: Set up Stripe, configure products/plans, and integrate webhooks for subscription management.

node.title: Build Pricing & Checkout UI
node.comment: Develop the pricing page and integrate the Stripe checkout flow into the application.

node.title: Test Payment Flow
node.comment: Conduct thorough end-to-end testing of the payment and subscription lifecycle using Stripe's test environment.

node.title: Phase 3: Marketing & Go-to-Market
node.comment: Prepare for launch and build a pipeline of potential customers.

node.title: Branding & Assets
node.comment: Develop a strong brand identity.

node.title: Design Logo and Visual Identity
node.comment: Create the logo, color palette, and typography guidelines.

node.title: Pre-Launch Marketing
node.comment: Generate interest and leads before the product is live.

node.title: Develop Landing Page
node.comment: Create a compelling landing page that explains the value proposition and captures email sign-ups for a waitlist.

node.title: Content Marketing
node.comment: Write blog posts and social media content about transcription, productivity, and related topics to attract the target audience.

node.title: Phase 4: User Feedback & Testing
node.comment: Validate the product with real users to ensure it solves their problems effectively.

node.title: Customer Discovery
node.comment: Based on the 'Entrepreneurial Journey' coaching, this is a top priority. Get out of the building and talk to users.

node.title: Identify Target User Profiles
node.comment: Define ideal customer profiles (e.g., podcasters, journalists, students, researchers).

node.title: Conduct User Interviews
node.comment: Schedule and conduct at least 20-30 interviews to deeply understand user pain points and existing workflows.

node.title: Alpha & Beta Testing
node.comment: Roll out the product to a limited audience to gather feedback and find bugs.

node.title: Private Alpha Test
node.comment: Invite a small group of 5-10 trusted users (from interviews) to test the initial product.

node.title: Public Beta Program
node.comment: Open the beta to the pre-launch waitlist to test scalability and gather broader feedback.

node.title: Implement Feedback Loop
node.comment: Set up a system (e.g., Discord, feedback board) to collect, categorize, and prioritize user feedback.

node.title: Phase 5: Official Launch & Rollout
node.comment: The official public launch of VoiceFlow Pro.

node.title: Launch Preparation
node.comment: Final checks before going live.

node.title: Finalize Production Build
node.comment: Incorporate critical feedback from beta testing and prepare the final launch version.

node.title: Prepare Launch Marketing Campaign
node.comment: Prepare emails for the waitlist, social media announcements, and potentially a Product Hunt launch.

node.title: Launch Day
node.comment: Execute the launch plan.

node.title: Go Live
node.comment: Deploy the application, enable sign-ups, and activate payment processing.

node.title: Announce Launch
node.comment: Send out all launch communications across all planned channels.

node.title: Post-Launch
node.comment: Monitor the launch and plan for the future.

node.title: Monitor System Performance & Analytics
node.comment: Closely watch server load, error rates, and user sign-up funnels.

node.title: Customer Support
node.comment: Be ready to respond to user questions and issues promptly.

node.title: Plan V2 Roadmap
node.comment: Begin planning the next set of features based on post-launch feedback and initial usage data.
